= Strip trailing whitespace =

    Apply the following to your vimrc:

        fun! <SID>StripTrailingWhitespaces()
            let l = line(".")
            let c = col(".")
            %s/\s\+$//e
            call cursor(l, c)
        endfun

        autocmd FileType * :call <SID>StripTrailingWhitespaces()
